description: Retrieves details about an authentication method used by an application.

parameters.name: ApplicationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the application.

parameters.name: AuthenticationMethodType
parameters.description: Specifies the type of authentication method for which you want details.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationMethod
nested_items.description: A structure that contains details about the requested authentication method.

nested_items.name: ActorPolicy
nested_items.description: An IAM policy document in JSON.
